Summary: {dr}Brightly lit orb was on, off, on, off and then appeared as a craft of some sort.
divs: Sighting DetailsWith my family on the way back from the grocery store and we noticed a bright light in the sky to the west directly in front of us. At first thought is was a plane but knew it wasnt when the orb vanished then reappeared with a bright light then it vanished again. Then the light came back on then off and then a black colored craft appeared for a few seconds and then vanished also. We lost sight when the craft again vanished.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Gardner
There were no other sightings in Gardner on or around October 6th 2012
